## Welcome to my GitHub project website.

<img src="Diana_pinecone.jpg" align="left" hspace="5"  width="300" height="190" />
My name is Diana Hackenburg and I am a PhD student in the Rubenstein School at the University of Vermont. I study the connections between human well-being and nature, as well as communication, education and community action related to the environment, specifically algal blooms.
